dc:title: Poverty and Pacifism
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Elaborates on the vision of voluntary poverty and what it implies for the kind of work we do, what we eat and drink, how we entertain ourselves. Recommends decentralized living and numerous books. Says "We need saints. God, give us saints."
